resources.string:
Hey there! 🙋‍♂️ Thank you for using Iron Vault! I'm Darshan Rao Gadicherla, creator of this app. 

You can: store passwords, copy them, 
edit, delete, and even import/export* all of your passwords as a text file! 

Iron Vault allows you to have multiple accounts to login and store your passwords separately.


There were several motivations 💪 behind creating this app, including the need for a fully secure platform to store passwords. 

However, the primary reason was to challenge myself in Android app development and create an application that I would find satisfying to use.


Do checkout my GitHub for the rest of the stuff I have made.


* = Import can only be done if you have exported the data before and saved the "passwords.txt" file in your local storage! Also do NOT clear data or cache of this app without atleast exporting the data! 😅
